# Define parameters
G <- 20
L <- 20
c <- 50
k <- 2
M <- 0.9
HWE <- 1
nr_humans <- 50
nr_snps <- 2000
bottleneck_nr <- 64

# Allele frequency Thresholds
very_rare_threshold_L <- 0
very_rare_threshold_H <- 0.05

rare_threshold_L <- 0.05
rare_threshold_H <- 0.2

common_threshold_L <- 0.2
common_threshold_H <- 0.5
